proposedChanges.value: Add bold headline in hero section stating 'LaunchBase: Your Business Operating System'.
proposedChanges.rationale: Clarifies the core offering immediately to visitors.

proposedChanges.value: Use 3-column grid in hero section to highlight top 3 benefits: 'Visibility', 'Control', 'Professionalism'.
proposedChanges.rationale: Helps prioritize and communicate key benefits clearly.

proposedChanges.value: Include 4-item FAQ accordion on pricing page addressing 'too expensive' objection.
Place a short video testimonial in hero section from a customer discussing control benefits.
proposedChanges.rationale: Visual proof can effectively reduce control fears.

proposedChanges.value: Add 3-column comparison chart after pricing hero showing Basic/Standard/Premium tiers.
proposedChanges.rationale: Visual comparison aids in understanding tier differences.

proposedChanges.value: Include bullet points under each pricing card listing key features and benefits.
proposedChanges.rationale: Clarifies what each tier offers at a glance.

proposedChanges.value: Ensure all pages have consistent tagline 'Hand it off without losing control'.
Place 5 customer logos in proof bar above fold on homepage.
